title: 'Not Refundable'
body:
4 days ago I bought the champion {{champion:238}} and I started to play him but soon realised I wanted to buy a different champion. So having 1 available refund left, I thought the logical thing to do was to refund zed and buy the Champion with the ip refunded. However - to my surprise - I am unable to refund the purchase. Next to zed splash art there is text stating that zed is 'not refundable.'

3 days after the zed purchase I bought the Champion {{champion:11}}, however I am able to refund this purchase.

_Thoughts_

* Maybe I waited too long and am unable to refund because of the 4 days in between purchase and wanting to refund

* Could be that I (on the same day as the purchase) opened a premium loot crate and unlocked the skin 'shockblade Zed' and can't refund zed because I have unlocked the skin permanently.
Those are the only things I can think of.

Please help, anything will be appreciated!

replies.body:
Yeah, you're on the right track with your second thought. This is from [Help and Support Garena](https://lol.garena.com/news/content/new-refund-system-available-now) (who use the same refund system as us):

_"If you own a champion and some of their skins, you need to return the skins before you can get a refund on the champion"_
